articles.title: Tampa Bay Lightning's Nikita Kucherov likely to play in Game 4 of Stanley Cup Final; Brayden Point doubtful
articles.description: Lightning star Nikita Kucherov, who left Game 3 of the Stanley Cup Final in the third period after being pushed along the ice into the boards, is likely to play in Game 4 against the Avalanche on Wednesday.
articles.content:
TAMPA -- Tampa Bay Lightning star Nikita Kucherov is likely to play in Game 4 of the Stanley Cup Final on Wednesday after leaving their Game 3 victory with an injury.

articles.title: Sources - PGA Tour looks to revamp schedule, increase purses in response to LIV Golf threat
articles.description: An overhauled PGA Tour schedule starting in 2023 is in the works with increased purses and a new global golf series, sources told ESPN's Mark Schlabach. PGA Tour members were informed of the plans Tuesday.
articles.content: In response to the LIV Golf threat, the PGA Tour hopes to introduce a revamped schedule that will include increased purses worth at least $20 million in at least eight existing marquee events and thr… [+2804 chars]

articles.author: Jesse RogersESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Memo - MLB to require all teams to 'muddy' ball using exact same technique
articles.description: A Major League Baseball memo, sent to all 30 teams, requires all new baseballs used in games to undergo the exact same "muddying" technique to remove the gloss.
articles.content:
Major League Baseball is now requiring teams to "muddy" baseballs before games using the exact same technique, according to a league memo sent to all 30 teams on Tuesday and obtained by ESPN.

articles.description: Boston president of basketball operations Brad Stevens told Jayson Tatum to get some rest after he had a tough NBA Finals.
articles.content:
